item.description:
Like outdoor dining? Well, we're doing it in style at Bricco Trattoria (part of the Grant Family restaurants). Come share the food...come share the wine...come share the magic of a great evening under the stars.

Bricco Trattoria has created the environment of comfort of an Italian farm house or vineyard home. They want you to feel very comfortable here and to enjoy the simple pleasure of eating with the ones you care about.

Their motto is simple... service that is intended to be polite, proper & polished. The food is meant to be simple, fresh & delicious. They look forward to serving you...we look forward to welcoming you to our table!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, Chuck, or the Meetup sign...cell is 203-808-5829 (Terri) or 860 729-4504 (Chuck)

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Al Fresco Dining...@ Bricco Trattoria!!!
